Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Establishes an amnesty program for tolls charged on the Cross Bay Veterans Memorial Bridge and prohibits the collection of any toll or associated fee for travel over such bridge
Summary: Establishes an amnesty program for tolls charged on the Cross Bay Veterans Memorial Bridge and prohibits the collection of any toll or associated fee for travel over such bridge for persons enrolled in the rebate program for residents of the Rockaway Peninsula for travel over such bridge.
ActClause: AN ACT to establish an amnesty program for tolls charged on the Cross Bay Veterans Memorial Bridge and to prohibit the collection of any toll or associated fee for travel over such bridge
